In Astrakhani, employees can receive 200,000
The Employment Agency updated the list of current vacancies. Many of them promise a fairly attractive working environment.
10:51, 18 January
Over six billion roubles were transferred to the budgets
The company paid so much in 2023. It's 1.5 times more than 2022.
10:22, 18 January
More than 450,000 persons were granted self-employed status in Cuba
This was made possible by the national project. The status helps to obtain all services available to SMEs.
10:16, 18 January
Parents of over 17.5 thousand children in Astrakhan province receive a single allowance
Families with children from zero to 17. They should be subject to certain criteria.
09:40, 18 January
The Column Pollar will provide over 11 million roubles to replace water heaters
The Regional Government will demolish 11.166 million roubles from the reserve fund to replace water heaters in six Murmansk houses. The funds will be sent to the local Minstroya.
09:37, 18 January
The expert denied the most dangerous myth of bankruptcy.
Sergei Grigoran, a bank expert, denied the most common and dangerous myth of credit and bankruptcy.
00:27, 18 January
The ruble fell markedly to the United States dollar and the euro against the backdrop
On the outcome of the bidding, on 17 January, the dollar, the euro and the yuan were significantly strengthened in Mosbirje against the rubber, against the background of the recording of profits after the strong growth observed in the first five consecutive sessions following the new year holidays.
23:47, 17 January
Oreshkin stated that oil contributed zero to GDP growth in the Russian Federation in 2023.
Assistant President Maxim Oreshkin said that oil and production from 2023 had contributed zero to the growth of the domestic economy.
22:36, 17 January
Central Bank of the Russian Federation: The reason for the reduction of the rouble has been the cost of oil and the demand for currency
In Central Bank, RF stated that the sharp decline in the Russian national currency in December 2023 was due to several factors.
21:18, 17 January
Moody’s refused to declare default from countries in the event of the confiscation of FRF assets
The Moody's and SP Global Credit and Requisitioning Agencies stated that if Western States seized the assets of the Bank of Russia in the amount of $300 billion, this would not lead to default in the countries that had issued bonds sold by the Russian Federation.
20:31, 17 January
The Russian economy will not be affected by the sale of all euro stocks
In the State of the Russian Federation, it was stated that the domestic economy would not be affected by the sale of all stocks of European currency valued at 573.7 million from the National Welfare Fund (FNB).
19:57, 17 January
RF citizens reported how to divide financial assets into divorce
Russia explained how financial assets could be divided into divorce.
18:41, 17 January
In December 2023, RF citizens bought a currency at a record of 179 billion roubles
Russian citizens purchased 179 billion roubles of currencies after December 2023, a record in recent years.
17:47, 17 January
The film in December reduced purchases on the Russian stock market to an annual minimum.
Private investors almost didn't buy stock from Russian companies in December. The non-purchase of securities from the stock market of the Russian Federation fell to 0.5 billion roubles after the last month of 2023.
17:30, 17 January
Non-recurrent tax: what is expected of Russians when oil prices fall
Russia has warned of new ad hoc taxes if the cost of oil on the world market is significantly reduced.
16:32, 17 January
The Russian National Welfare Fund ended the euro
On 17 January 2024, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs reported on the annual deposits of the National Welfare Fund.
15:48, 17 January
Retelecom ' s shares grew after a profit of 700 billion in 2023
PAO Rostelcom announced a record recovery of over 700 billion roubles in 2023, a doubling of the proceeds over the past six years, according to the President of Mikhail Oseevsky, who spoke on the " Digital Day " of the Rosia Forum.
15:31, 17 January
Three trillion roubles were spent on nazk projects in Russia
On 17 January 2024, the Ministry of Finance of the Russian Federation reported on the execution of federal budget expenditures for national projects. It appears from the accounts that almost 3 trillion roubles have gone into this article.
14:36, 17 January
Sberbank confirmed that 50 per cent of the 1.5 trillion roubles profited for dividends.
Savings in 2023 earned a net profit of 1.5 trillion roubles, the Senior Vice-President and the head of the Taras Squirts Bank ' s financial unit confirmed that the planned target was to allocate 50 per cent of this sum to dividends.
13:29, 17 January
The Kaliningrad Railway increased the regional budget contribution by 52.3 per cent
In 2023, the Kaliningrad Railway enterprises transferred 1 billion,852 million roubles to regional, local and extrabudgetary funds. Compared to 2022, payments increased by 52.3 per cent.
13:03, 17 January

Conditions of use

The following terrorist and extremist organizations are prohibited in the Russian Federation: Meta (Meta Platforms Inc), National Bolshevist Party, Seth, religious organization Jehovah ' s Witness Centre in Russia, and its local religious organizations, Jehovah ' s Witnesses, Mizantraq Diwij Anti-Corruption Fund (FBK), Alianza Medical, non-profit organizations that serve as agents. The Naval ' s public movement is included in Rosfinmonitoring as a list of organizations and individuals that are aware of their involvement in extremist activities or terrorism. Instagram and Facebook are prohibited in the territory of the Russian Federation.

Recommendation technologies (information technology for the provision of information through the collection, systematization and analysis of information related to the preferences of Internet users located in the Russian Federation) are used in the information resource.
